channel.title: Sample Vodcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: A sample Vodcast to fiddle around
channel.itunes:author: needz
channel.itunes:summary: This is just a sample Vodcast feed to be able to add it to your custom Vodcasts, if you don't have any other Vodcasts URL to try yet
channel.description: This is just a sample Vodcast feed to be able to add it to your custom Vodcasts, if you don't have any other Vodcasts URL to try yet

item.title: LG Nature Clip
item.itunes:author: LG Electronics
item.itunes:subtitle: LG Nature four seasons clip
item.itunes:summary: In Europe, 16:9 is the standard broadcast format for most digital channels and all HDTV broadcasts. Some countries adopted the format for analog television, first by using the PALplus standard (now obsolete) and then by simply using WSS signals on normal PAL broadcasts.

item.title: Winter Extreme Sports Clip
item.itunes:author: Jane Doe
item.itunes:subtitle: Comparing socket wrenches is fun!
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about metric vs. old english socket wrenches. Which one is better? Do you really need both? Get all of your answers here.
